RelatedSentence: Up to 300 Boko Haram terrorists were killed by armed civilians in Nigeria last week .
In the villages of Rann and Shuwa in Kala - Balge local government , civilians ambushed and decimated a Boko Haram invasion , killing over 200 terrorists and capturing dozens .
